title.rendered: 2022 Abu Dhabi Grand Prix Travel Package Rates

content.rendered:
2022 Abu Dhabi Grand Prix Travel Package Rates

The rates below are based on a package including four nights accommodation in Abu Dhabi, your choice of race viewing, personal concierge services, and more. You can further customize your package with additional events and parties, extra nights, private tours, room upgrades, and any other extras that will make your experience perfect.
Race ViewingPackages From
Premium Grandstand Seating$5,175
Exclusive Hospitality$13,795
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 50% deposit is required to secure your package. Final balance will be due 90 days before departure. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.
